name: Raster Media
description:
For over ten years Raster Media has been developing well-designed web-based
and mobile apps tailored to our clients’ businesses. We are a lively group of
designers and programmers having fun creating beautiful software to help
make our wonderful clients’ lives easier and businesses more successful. We
are immersed in the interactive arena each and every day, and our journey
often leads us into uncharted territory, giving us the opportunity to stay on top

of emerging trends in the industry.
 
Raster Media is a UX-focused website and mobile app development shop with
a twist. Yes, we design and construct websites and apps - not your typical
websites whipped together by your brother-in-law - but rather rock-solid
data-driven solutions architected and developed by seasoned experts. We draw
upon a keen understanding of human behavior and business acumen to find
out what your customers really want and how to give it to them.
Web
At Raster Media we have the experience and expertise to design and build
engaging, interactive web apps and gorgeous high-end sites so rich and
responsive that you can't believe they're running in a browser.
READ MORE...
